articles.author: John Hendren
articles.title: US gun violence: Chicago group aims to stop shootings
articles.description: In one of the United States's deadliest cities, a group is attempting to curb gun crime by working with community.
articles.content:
Thanks to a group that's using former gang members to reach out to one of the city's most violent neighbourhoods, gun shootings in Chicago have plummeted.
It's using a novel method with a disruptive approach.
Al Jazeera's John Hendren reports from Chicago.
